title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Temporary
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Temporary 
Increase of Official Controls and Emergency Measures on Imports of Food and 
Feed of Non-Animal Origin) (Amendment) (No.2) Regulations 2024.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (temporary increase official control emergency measure import food feed non-animal origin) (amendment) (no.2) regulation 2024

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 2. The European Union (Temporary Increase of Official Controls and
text_raw:
2. The European Union (Temporary Increase of Official Controls and 
Emergency Measures on Imports of Food and Feed of Non-Animal Origin) 
Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 9 of 2020) are amended in Regulation 3(1), by 
substituting for the definition of “Regulation 2019/1793” the following – 

“‘Regulation 2019/1793’ means Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 
2019/1793 of 22 October 2019 as amended by Commission Implementing 
Regulation (EU) 2020/625 of 6 May 2020, Commission Implementing 
Regulation (EU) 2020/1540 of 22 October 2020, Commission Implementing 
Regulation (EU) 2021/608 of 14 April 2021, Commission Implementing 
Regulation (EU) 2021/1900 of 27 October 2021, Commission Implementing 
Regulation 
(EU) 2021/2246 of 15 December 2021, Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2022/913 of 30 May 2022, Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2023/174 of 26 January 2023, Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2023/1110 of 6 June 2023, Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2024/286 of 16 January 2024 and 
Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2024/1662 of 11 June 2024;”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 17th September, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [459] 3

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 3. The European Union (Temporary Increase of Official Controls and
text_raw:
3. The European Union (Temporary Increase of Official Controls and 
Emergency Measures on Imports of Food and Feed of Non-Animal Origin) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2024 (S.I. No. 176 of 2024) are revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

10 September, 2024. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [459]

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations update existing Regulations with regard to additional levels of 
controls on the import of certain food of non-animal origin from specific third 
countries with regard to pesticide residues and on the import of certain feed of nonanimal origin from specific third countries. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [459] 5
